=== Introduction ===

The Ubuntu Georgia Local Community Team will promote Ubuntu, Linux, and Open Source in the US state of Georgia. We also provide support, free CDs, as well as events for people who want to know more about Ubuntu. 

In the Atlanta metro area, '''<nowiki>[[http://ALE.org|ALE]]</nowiki>''' (the Atlanta Linux Enthusiasts) are an active Linux User Group (LUG). In fact, a subset of members '''<nowiki>[[http://www.meetup.com/ALE-Atlanta-Linux-Enthusiasts|Meetup every Sunday]]</nowiki> '''. This weekly opportunity is the easiest way to get assistance with Ubuntu, Linux and Open Source.

=== Meetings ===
MONTHLY - ALE-Atlanta Linux Enthusiasts - See <nowiki>[[http://ale.org/|ALE.org]]</nowiki><<BR>>
WEEKLY  - ALE-Atlanta Linux Enthusiasts meetups are held every Sunday. See <nowiki>[[http://www.meetup.com/ALE-Atlanta-Linux-Enthusiasts/|Meetup page]]</nowiki>

=== Georgia Linux Organizations ===
Visit <nowiki>[[GeorgiaOrganizations|Georgia Organizations page]]</nowiki> for a list of Linux User Groups and other organizations in Georgia.

=== Launchpad page ===
Join by adding yourself to the Launchpad page at: https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-ga <<BR>><<BR>>
